schemaDescription: search_params.filter_groups: string: To include multiple filter criteria, you can group filters within filterGroups: - to apply AND logic, include a comma separated list of conditions within one set of filters. - to apply OR logic, include multiple filters within a filterGroup. You can include a maximum of three filterGroups with up to three filters in each group.
search_params.limit: string: Number of results to return

token.description: An OAuth2 Public App (client) token structure used to make API calls.
